Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.restlet.engine.component.ComponentXmlParser
    Use XML support in the Spring extension instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.restlet.engine.adapter.HttpRequest.addHeader(Request, String, String)
    Use Message.getHeaders() directly instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.restlet.engine.local.ZipEntryRepresentation(MediaType, ZipFile, ZipEntry)
    Use ZipEntryRepresentation.ZipEntryRepresentation(MediaType, ZipFile, ZipEntry, int) instead.
